ud1.10:14.3: Compare Kaṭha Upaniṣad 2.3.14: “There the sun shines not, nor the moon and stars”.
ud1.10:16.1: This tag is unique to the Udāna, and seems to be a relic of an earlier oral organization. It is virtually identical to the tag concluding each discourse of the Itivuttaka, except there we find _attha_ instead of _udāna_.
